content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --EXFL
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --EXFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.148
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --EXFL is populated and the value is different from
  "Y"
Outcome:
  Message: --EXFL value must either be 'Y' or null
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '148'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Y if the result should be excluded from all calculations,
                  otherwise null.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --EXFL is populated and the value is different from "Y"

Outcome.Message: --EXFL value must either be 'Y' or null

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Y if the result should be excluded from all calculations, otherwise null.
